column4: what, GParted is one of the best partitioning applications around. You only loose files if you wipe your partitions, which any partitioner will do.

I regularly use GParted to partition my many drives on many systems, unless you totally wipe a partition with data on it you're not going to loose any data. And it warns you before you do anything remotly dangerous. In any case data loss is the fault of the user not the program
